"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom" import LogoutButton from "./Logoutbutton" const Navbar = () => { const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false) const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen) } return (
Library System
Books Users Loans Inventory Popular Books Export Data
{isMobileMenuOpen && (
Books Users Loans Inventory Popular Books Export Data
)}
) } export default Navbar
